articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google revamps its Play Store with AI features and more - TechCrunch
articles.description: Users can expect more personalization, a redesigned Apps tab, new Play Games experience, and other features that leverage Gemini AI.
articles.content: Google said Tuesday it’s making a number of changes to how the Play Store looks and functions in an effort to better personalize the store to its users and increase engagement. Among the new features… [+4497 chars]

articles.title: Charlie Kirk’s memorial was one of the most heavily fortified events of its kind, expert says - Fortune
articles.description: “Pyrotechnics are usually designed for visual impact, not for addressing security threats.”
articles.content: Charlie Kirks memorial was granted the highest U.S. security designation, and included a bulletproof-glass-encased podium area, TSA-like metal detectors, and counter-sniper teams.The event on Sunday … [+3896 chars]
